name: SHADOW SWITCHER (C64)
description:
Run around abandoned places and collect all the rings - but be careful, evil zombie robots are chasing you!

Your shadow is your secret weapon - when in danger, hit fire to switch places!

40 exciting levels are waiting for you to be mastered. Plus: Create your own levels with the built-in level editor!

You can choose whatever price you would like to pay for the game, even $0.00! If you're more into physical stuff however, you can check out the "Disk Version" on shadow.drwuro.com

Note: This is a game for the Commodore C64 home computer. If you have no C64 or if you have no possibility to transfer .PRG or .D64 files to a real C64, you can use an Emulator like VICE to play it on your PC/Mac or similar.

Note: The use of .D64 format is strongly recommended, as the game saves highscores and user levels. The .PRG format should only be used if you know what you are doing.
